# Paginator

# Paginator

Pagination logic handling.

Kind: global class

  • Paginator
    • new exports.Paginator([offset], [data])
    • .offset ⇒ Number
    • .offset
    • .page ⇒ Number
    • .page
    • .pages ⇒ Number
    • .pageStart ⇒ Number
    • .pageEnd ⇒ Number
    • .data([data]) ⇒ Array
    • .inPageRange(page) ⇒ boolean
    • .hasNext() ⇒ boolean
    • .hasPrevious() ⇒ boolean
    • .next()
    • .previous()

# new exports.Paginator([offset], [data])

Creates a new Paginator instance.

Param Type Default
[offset] Number 50
[data] Array []

# paginator.offset ⇒ Number

Returns the paginator offset.

Kind: instance property of Paginator

# paginator.offset

Sets the paginator offset.

Kind: instance property of Paginator

Param Type
offset Number

# paginator.page ⇒ Number

Get the current paginator page.

Kind: instance property of Paginator

# paginator.page

Sets the current paginator page.

Kind: instance property of Paginator

# paginator.pages ⇒ Number

Returns the overall number of pages.

Kind: instance property of Paginator

# paginator.pageStart ⇒ Number

Returns the page start index.

Kind: instance property of Paginator
Access: protected

# paginator.pageEnd ⇒ Number

Returns the page end index.

Kind: instance property of Paginator
Access: protected

# paginator.data([data]) ⇒ Array

if called with parameter sets the paginator data, Retrieves the data from the current paginator page.

Kind: instance method of Paginator

Param Type Default
[data] Array

# paginator.inPageRange(page) ⇒ boolean

Checks whether a page is valid.

Kind: instance method of Paginator

Param Type
page Number

# paginator.hasNext() ⇒ boolean

Checks if there's a next page.

Kind: instance method of Paginator

# paginator.hasPrevious() ⇒ boolean

Checks if there's a previous page.

Kind: instance method of Paginator

# paginator.next()

Advances to the next page.

Kind: instance method of Paginator

# paginator.previous()

Goes to the previous page.

Kind: instance method of Paginator
